1623360.name: Кайград. Оборванные нити
1623360.description: «Kaigrad. Broken Threads» is a long-awaited addition to the storyline with a Herbalist in the village... and not only. DLC will open up the opportunity to look at the world of «Kaigrad» from the other side, meet new characters, spend time with old and beloved heroes, find out the answers to questions and get questions that are worth finding answers to. And, of course, try again to save the world from falling into darkness. We have kept the atmosphere, but upgraded the visual style, as well as added more game mechanics, which will give the passage a completely new emotion.
